description: Alternately append n to beginning or end of previous term.
references: Felice Russo, A set of new Smarandache functions, sequences and conjectures in number theory, American Research Press 2000
maple: P:=proc(i) local a,n; a:=1; print(a); for n from 2 by 1 to i do a:=1/2*(1+(-1)^n)*(n*10^trunc(evalf(floor(1+log10(a)),100))+a)+1/2*(1-(-1)^n)*(a*10^trunc(evalf(floor(1+log10(n)),100))+n); print(a); od; end: P(100); [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 29 2008]
author: _Felice Russo_, Feb 25 2000
